General.Name: ALBA SE
General.Description: ALBA SE engages in the steel and metal recycling business. It collects, processes, markets, and trades in steel and metal scrap. ALBA SE was formerly known as INTERSEROH SE and changed its name to ALBA SE in July 2012. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Cologne, Germany. ALBA SE is a subsidiary of ALBA Group KG.
